commit.message:
RULE (Java) Methods and field names should not be the same or differ only by capitalization

Made changes to conform to this rule

nodes.bodyText: Is this sort of thing really an issue? I thought it was fine given the variables have clearly defined, different scopes.
I would make this one queryRecordStore, as it is a record store representing a query, not a query of a record store.
Same deal here as my previous comment.
